ITG Inc - Quality Assurance Summer Intern (June - Aug 2016) - Culver City, CA - ONSITE - http://www.itg.com/

We're looking for a QA Summer Intern who's interested in learning about the intersection of Finance & Technology and is interested in developing an automation framework for a key product in our world-class suite of trading tools. Ideal candidate should have experience with SQL, PERL, comfortable in a UNIX environment with an interest in being in the LA area longer-term.

Open to students graduating between December 2016 - May 2017. For immediate consideration, email your resume to Dana.Blessing@itg.com.
